text: Samoa was first at the Olympic Games in 1984. They have been in every Summer Olympic Games since then. The nation has never been in the Winter Olympic Games. As of 2011, no athlete competing for Samoa has ever won an Olympic medal. The National Olympic Committee for Samoa was formed in 1983 and recognized by the International Olympic Committee the same year. ==Related pages== * List of IOC country codes ==References== ==Other websites== * * Samoa profile at London2012.com Category:National sports teams of Samoa Category:Nations at the Olympics Category:Samoa
title: Samoa at the Olympics
